greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Continued fraction expansion of the constant c in A245224; c = sup{f(n,1)}, where f(1,x) = x + 1 and thereafter f(n,x) = x + 1 if n is in A054385, else f(n,x) = 1/x.
mathematica: tmpRec = $RecursionLimit; $RecursionLimit = Infinity; u[x_] := u[x] = x + 1; d[x_] := d[x] = 1/x; r = E/(E-1); w = Table[Floor[k*r], {k, 2000}]; s[1] = 1; s[n_] := s[n] = If[MemberQ[w, n - 1], u[s[n - 1]], d[s[n - 1]]]; max = Max[N[Table[s[n], {n, 1, 3000}], 200]] (* A245224 *)
xref: Cf. A226080 (infinite Fibonacci tree), A245217, A245219, A245222, A245224.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Jul 14 2014
